title: Banner of the Eye (6C98)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession • Hand Weapon
Strength:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be an [Sauron] Orc. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add (1) for each site you control.
Lore:	“Stony-faced they were, with dark window- holes staring north and east and west, and each window was full of sleepless eyes.”
Rarity:	C
